conversations.content: Please buy a smart watch for me.

<|Function_Thought|>
I will search the shopping catalog for smart watches to find suitable options. I will use a general product name "smart watch" and set category to "Electronics" and a minimum rating of 4.0 to prioritize quality. Next step will be to present the results so you can pick one to purchase; after you choose I'll add it to the cart and proceed with checkout, but I will not log in or complete payment without your authorization/credentials.
<|/Function_Thought|>
Calling tool: search_product

{"product_name":"smart watch","price":null,"price_min":null,"price_max":null,"brand":null,"category":"Electronics","product_id":null,"rating_min":4.0,"rating_max":null}
<|Final_Answer|>
I've started by searching for smart watches (category: Electronics, min rating 4.0). I found some options — please tell me which one you'd like to buy, or give preferences (budget, brand, features, or a specific model). I will then add it to the cart and proceed, but I won't log in or complete payment without your explicit permission and any required credentials.

Next steps I can take once you choose:
- Add the selected product (and quantity) to your cart.
- View the cart and compute the total.
- Check available discount codes.
- Check bank balance and, if you authorize, log into your shopping account and complete checkout.

What would you like me to do now?
</|Final_Answer|>
